HiddenText.Name: What should I do if the speaking sessions take too long or run over time?
HiddenText.OpenningText: What should I do if the speaking sessions take too long or run over time?
HiddenText.BodyCopy:
Allowing the Pathway student to lead discussions is important, but so is your time. You are only committed to the class’s assigned time (20, 3o, or 40 minutes, depending on the class). If time is frequently running over, you can speed things up, perhaps by chit-chatting less. The lessons are designed to take the allotted time.

However, if you are OK with spending more time at each appointment, that is absolutely fine. The decision is up to you.
